name: Trash Trail
description:
NOTE:

This game was made in roughly 3 days for the Wowie! Game Jam 4.0 with the theme: Collaborate with AI!

You're a trash robot in the far future and you have been infected with computer malware! Your objective is to get to the computer as fast as possible to help yourself.

Use your robot friends to finish levels. You can only place a limited amount of them in each level but every one of them has different abilities:

Dave - shoots cardboard boxes upwards from his two hands

Ray - shoots bullets horizontally and you can use the bullets as platforms

Shard - temporarily disables all malware blockades in the level every couple of seconds but can only be placed once

This game is extremely buggy at times (especially at the last level) so if you can, please leave some feedback!
